participant_1.background:
I like riding horses.
I will graduate from high school in two years.
My bedroom is purple and lime green.
I have brown curly hair.
I am a vegan.

participant_2.background:
I am married to a doctor.
I enjoy long walks with my dog.
I am a professional tennis player.
I live in a three storey house.
My family is continuously growing.

content.text: It's nice to meet you! What do you do for fun?
I enjoy playing tennis, going for walks with my dog, and spending time with my family.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I like to ride horses, paint, and play video games.
I've never ridden a horse, but I've always wanted to try it! I love to paint as well. Do you have any favorite paintings?
I love Van Gogh's work. I think his paintings are so beautiful and expressive.
Yes, I love Van Gogh's work too! I think it's so unique and creative.
So, what's it like being a professional tennis player?
It's a lot of hard work, but it's also a lot of fun! I love being able to travel and compete against other players from all over the world.
That sounds amazing! I'm sure it's a lot of pressure, but it must be really rewarding to win tournaments.
It is! It's an incredible feeling to stand on the podium and hear your national anthem playing.
I can imagine! So, what's your goal for the future?
I'm hoping to continue to play tennis at a high level and maybe even win a Grand Slam tournament one day.
That would be amazing! I'm rooting for you!
